duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and develop teams of General Managers across multiple restaurant locations to achieve operational excellence and financial performance.
Responsible for P&L management, inventory management, budgeting, and achieving sales targets.
Utilize Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for reporting and analysis.
Handle confidential information and demonstrate tact in difficult situations.
Manage multiple projects and timelines with a sense of urgency and follow-through.
Train and develop teams to ensure consistent and exceptional customer service.
Maintain a calm and tactful demeanor when dealing with difficult situations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
